title: MBMBaM 592: The Naming of 2022
description:
It’s the best time to tune in for the first time as we set goals, or maybe just settle on some mood lighting, for the year 2022. However long it takes. Ten minutes. Forty minutes. The whole episode. It’s only three years into the twenties and we honestly already can’t wait for the thirties.

Suggested talking points: Carl Daniels, Sarcopha-Get It , A Night to Remember, Turn up the Fondue, Not That Kangaroo Jack

Center for Reproductive Rights: https://reproductiverights.org/
author: shows@mbmbam.com (Travis McElroy, Justin McElroy, Griffin McElroy)
